--- Switchblade ---

Switchblade steers the floating vessel around the peninsula, 
avoiding hazards along the way. He opens a commlink to 
Megatron, "Hey Megs, I'm almost at the designated location. 
Switchblade out." He sits up, and begins scanning for anything that 
should be there.
